task.title: Adding a Column to a Board
task.shortdesc: Columns are an important part of the orginaization of Monday. Columns allow users to customize their board to fit their specific needs.

prereq.p: Before you can add a column to a board, you must login and create a board.

taskbody.context: You may want to add a cloumn to add tags to task, make a timeline, add text or add numbers. Adding these elements can further customize your board and increase clarity.

step.cmd: From the board page, click the + button on the right side of the board.
Choose the type of new column you want to create.

info.p: Your column is added to the board and can be edited.
